qas.question: How much a  Myanmar's boundaries are encompassed by beachfront lands?
How many people dwell in  Myanmar ?
What is the land mass of  Myanmar ?

answers.text: Myanmar is 676,578 square kilometres (261,227 sq mi) in size

qas.question: Is the capital city the holder of the largest amount of the population in  Myanmar ?
What is the name of the capital city of Myanmar?

context: Myanmar (myan-MAR i/miɑːnˈmɑːr/ mee-ahn-MAR, /miˈɛnmɑːr/ mee-EN-mar or /maɪˈænmɑːr/ my-AN-mar (also with the stress on first syllable); Burmese pronunciation: [mjəmà]),[nb 1] officially the Republic of the Union of Myanmar and also known as Burma, is a sovereign state in Southeast Asia bordered by Bangladesh, India, China, Laos and Thailand. One-third of Myanmar's total perimeter of 1,930 km <a0_0>(1,200 miles) forms an uninterrupted coastline<a0_0/> along the Bay of Bengal and the Andaman Sea. The country's 2014 census revealed a much lower population than expected, with <a1_0>51 million people recorded<a1_0/>. <a2_0>Myanmar is 676,578 square kilometres (261,227 sq mi) in size<a2_0/>. Its <a4_0>capital city is Naypyidaw<a4_0/> and its <a3_0>largest city is Yangon (Rangoon)<a3_0/>.
